channel.title: self on Bits of everything
channel.description: Recent content in self on Bits of everything

item.title: Caveman Approach
item.description: A friend of mine recently came up with the joke that modern software runs on answers from Stackoverflow and not on AWS. Even though it is obviously an exagerration, I agree that developers sometimes tend to overabuse an opportunity to search for a solution immediately after they have been challenged with a problem or even simply been given a task to implement. As a lazy person programmer I often times do it myself too!
